Question: How many people do this business together?
What is the name of their company?
How many cookies have they sold?
According to the boys, what is their secret to success?
What did they learn to gain more knowledge?
Answer: Baking, Selling, Advertising (promoting the cookies) and Packaging

Question: Why is it important to have a good attitude as well as skill?
Answer: A good attitude makes people feel good as we smile through the tasks. Skill-building means being willing to learn and practice to become an expert at what you do.
